char_pool_error: You need to select at least one character type!

empty_expression_message_box.title: Empty expression
empty_expression_message_box.message: The seed expression is empty. Do you want to use the default expression?

syntax_errors.title: Syntax error
syntax_errors.message: There is a syntax error in the seed expression. Please check!

unknown_errors.title: Unknown error
unknown_errors.message: An error occurred during the generation process

message.welcome: Welcome to the random string generator!

safe_random: Use the secrets module to generate safe random strings
seed_expressions: You can use mathematical expressions to generate seeds based on the current time (support math module functions)
the_characters_are_varied: Contains uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters, and can be customized
string_length: Set the length through the slider or input box ({self.length_min}-{self.length_max})
character_type: Check the character type to be included
rebuild: Click the button or adjust the settings to automatically generate a new string
copy_method: Double-click the result box or click the copy button to copy the string to the clipboard
